title.rendered: NVR502-32B-P16 Uniview 16 Channel NVR, High Mbps, High Decoding, PoE, NDAA

Capacity Up to 10TB for each disk

Download Product Description

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Our NVR502-32B-P16 Uniview 32 Channel NVR is a professional IP Network Video Recorder with advanced features. The 502 Series features higher decoding capabilities than other NVRs. In addition, you have 320Mbps In and 160Mbps Out to work with! Ultra265 technology combines U-Code and H.265 to reduce storage space and enhance image quality cutting storage costs by 75% or more! This 16 Channel NVR can accept (2) SATA Drives up to 10TB Each so you have plenty of storage. You can also use IP Cameras up to 16MP resolution. The NVR502-32B-P16 comes with a Built In, 16 Channel PoE, therefore, an additional PoE switch for up to 16 cameras is not required. Uniview NVR’s are ONVIF compliant with profiles S, G and T, so third party cameras are supported. These great features along with many others show UNV’s attention to detail and customer satisfaction. A favorite of our dealers and installers due to reliability and ease of use.
